item.title: Tinkerer's Guild
item.description: Tinkerer’s Guild A guild regulating the distribution and management of Gems within the Deepcrystal Enclave for the purpose of experimentation and development by Inscriptionists and Runeographer.

item.title: Deepcrystal Enclave
item.description: Deepcrystal Enclave A nation residing in the Scar that prides itself over its rapid research and mastery over Gems.

item.title: index
item.description: Gempaign How to Explore Folders are simply used to declutter the space. Prefer navigating by tags by prefixing your search with # or by going to tags.

item.title: Industrialization & Regulation
item.description: Industrialization & Regulation The wars from the times of Commonization began to die down as the consolidation of power worsened and the remaining participants could no longer sustain constant, escalating conflicts.

item.title: Aetheric Conclave
item.description: Aetheric Conclave A location once seen as a religious epicenter since Commonization but gained popularity and power during the Renaissance.

item.title: Trinity Kingdom
item.description: Trinity Kingdom A still-standing nation established before Commonization only grown more powerful from the investments of gem families.

item.title: Scar
item.description: Scar The Scar is a large ravine found in the Shardlands.

item.title: Amethyst
item.description: Amethyst An amethyst’s Intrinsic Power grants its users foresight.

item.title: Gem
item.description: Gem A concentrated collection of energy capable of enhancing or empowering both organic and inorganic matter.

item.title: Shardwalker
item.description: Shardwalker An occupation focused on the discovery and extraction of Gems to replenish stockpiles and reserves.
